title: Is Flashing to lane ok?
body: I flash to lane all the time and my team doesn't like it. Why?

replies.body:
I ghost to lane all the time my dude, so I don't see why not. Try the ghost + flash combo and get to lane super fast. 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I'll take the troll bait, youre using a 3minute cooldown escape (or chasing) tool to get to lane a tiny bit faster, if you want to get back to lane quickely take teleport.  

But this is a pretty obvious troll
